node.title: New COVID-19 variant, Omicron, set alarm bells ringing over the weekend. Here's what you need to know
node.description: The Omicron variant has been declared a COVID-19 "variant of concern"Â by the World Health Organization as cases start appearing in countries well away from southern Africa. Here's everything that happened over the weekend regarding this new variant.
node.content:
["The Omicron variant \u2014\u00a0previously known as the South African variant and\u00a0the B.1.1.529 variant \u2014\u00a0has been declared a COVID-19 variant of concern\u00a0by the World Health Organization (WHO) over the weekend.", "Some international borders closed, travel guidance changed, the markets took a nosedive,\u00a0the variant got its official name and the WHO called for calm, all within a few days.\u00a0", "Omicron\u00a0is the fifth strain of COVID-19 to be designated a\u00a0 variant of concern by the WHO.", "While scientists\u00a0do not know a lot about this strain yet, it is believed to be more transmissible than previous variants.\u00a0", "Here is a rundown of what happened over the weekend:", "
Omicron\u00a0confirmed\u00a0in Australia
", "The variant has officially reached Australian shores, with the\u00a0first cases detected in hotel quarantine in Sydney, where two overseas travellers tested\u00a0positive for the variant on\u00a0Sunday afternoon.", "Another traveller in quarantine was tested\u00a0in the Howard\u00a0Springs facility in Northern Territory after arriving from South Africa.", "He tested\u00a0positive to COVID-19 and\u00a0the details of his results will be shared in the coming days.\u00a0\u00a0", "
Travel advice for arrivals to Australia changes
", "Australia has tightened its borders for international arrivals coming from southern African countries.", "Any travellers arriving from South Africa, Lesotho, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Namibia, Eswatini, Malawi and the Seychelles must undergo 14 days' quarantine.\u00a0", "In an effort to reduce the spread of the new variant, NSW updated its international travel regulations for arrivals from southern Africa.\u00a0", "Anyone arriving in the state from the\u00a0nine impacted southern African countries\u00a0is now required to go into hotel quarantine for 14 days, regardless of of their vaccination status.\u00a0", "Travellers from other countries into NSW, Victoria and ACT are now also required to immediately go to their place of residence or accommodation and isolate for 72 hours pending further health advice.\u00a0", "At a press conference on Sunday, Victoria's Chief Health Officer Brett Sutton said vaccines would help provide protection against\u00a0the Omicron\u00a0variant, but it would only be known in the coming weeks just how much protection they\u00a0offered.", "He said\u00a0the emergence of the new variant did not mean Australians\u00a0were \"back to square one\".\u00a0", "", "
Brett Sutton says Omicron variant is 'likely to be very transmissible'.
", "
Cases confirmed in Europe, Hong Kong\u00a0 \u00a0\u00a0
", "While the Netherlands, Italy, Germany, Hong Kong, Belgium, Austria and the United Kingdom all have confirmed cases of the Omicron variant, the Czech Republic is investigating\u00a0probable infections.\u00a0", "The Netherlands, alone, has at least 13 confirmed cases.", "Testing is underway on the variant but\u00a0is not yet known how transmissible or how severe the symptoms of the new strain are.", "However, case numbers in South Africa have ballooned, and that is\u00a0believed to be linked to the emergence of the new variant.\u00a0", "
International borders close to southern Africa
", "Many countries including the United States,\u00a0United Kingdom and European Union\u00a0nations have also closed their borders to southern Africa in an effort\u00a0to reduce the spread of the new variant, which was first detected in South Africa.\u00a0", "Israel has closed its borders to all foreigners,\u00a0making it the first country in the world to do so.\u00a0", "
WHO\u00a0calls for calm
", "The WHO\u00a0and medical experts have warned people not to overreact while studies of the variant are underway.\u00a0", "It made the statement,\u00a0after\u00a0Friday's slump in the markets, and urged nations to help developing countries get vaccinated.\u00a0", "Meanwhile, the makers of the AstraZeneca, Pfizer, Moderna and Novavax vaccines said they had\u00a0plans to adapt their shots to combat the Omicron\u00a0variant.", "The pharmaceutical\u00a0firms expect to be able to tweak the vaccines to be effective against the new variant\u00a0within 100 days.\u00a0", "", "
What COVID-19 travel insurance doesn't cover you for(Emilia Terzon)
"]
